errInvalidDocNumber:
{tagName} cannot be published on 3DSwYm. 
It must contain only one file
errUploadContent: Error while uploading the file on 3DSwYm
ERROR_FILE_FORMAT_UNAUTHORIZED: The uploaded file format is not authorized
ERROR_FILE_SIZE_EXCEEDED: The uploaded file size exceeds the maximum allowed size in 3DSwYm
ERROR_FUNCTIONNAL_GENERIC: The uploaded file name is not 3DSwYm compliant
ERROR_FILE_UPLOAD_ERROR: The uploaded file is either empty or exceeds the maximum allowed size in 3DSwYm
